com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.interfaces
Interface SnowmanPlayer

All Superinterfaces:
DynamicEntity, com.sun.sgs.app.ManagedObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
RobotImpl, SnowmanPlayerImpl
public interface SnowmanPlayer
extends DynamicEntity, com.sun.sgs.app.ManagedObject

The SnowmanPlayer interface defines the basic behavior of a player in the snowman game.

Author:
Owen Kellett
